Opening Ploy.name: Opening Ploy
Opening Ploy.fullText:
Gladiator Champion Attack 11Opening Ploy

An attack against one of your enemies reveals weakness in all of them, helping you seize whatever advantage it might grant you.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Primary ability vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + ability modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain combat advantage against the target and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against enemies adjacent to the target.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 52.
Opening Ploy.flavor: An attack against one of your enemies reveals weakness in all of them, helping you seize whatever advantage it might grant you.
Opening Ploy.range:
Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Primary ability vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + ability modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies gain combat advantage against the target and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against enemies adjacent to the target.

Finishing Strike.name: Finishing Strike
Finishing Strike.fullText:
Gladiator Champion Attack 20Finishing Strike

You close in for the kill when you sense your enemy’s reserves failing, then compel the foe’s allies to stay for the slaughter.

Daily        Martial, Reliable, Stance, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One bloodied creature

Attack: Primary ability vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + ability modifier damage. You can assume the finishing strike stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you deal damage to a bloodied enemy with an attack, each enemy adjacent to the bloodied enemy is immobilized until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 52.
Finishing Strike.flavor: You close in for the kill when you sense your enemy’s reserves failing, then compel the foe’s allies to stay for the slaughter.
Finishing Strike.range:
Melee weapon

Target: One bloodied creature

Attack: Primary ability vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + ability modifier damage. You can assume the finishing strike stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you deal damage to a bloodied enemy with an attack, each enemy adjacent to the bloodied enemy is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Finishing Strike.onHit: 4[W] + ability modifier damage. You can assume the finishing strike stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you deal damage to a bloodied enemy with an attack, each enemy adjacent to the bloodied enemy is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Fail to Disappoint.name: Fail to Disappoint
Fail to Disappoint.fullText:
Gladiator Champion Utility 12Fail to Disappoint

No matter how grim the situation, you find a way to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat.

At-Will        Martial
Free Action      Melee 1

Trigger: You are hit and damaged by an enemy’s attack while you are bloodied.

Target: The triggering enemy

Effect: You shift 1 square as a free action. You slide the target 1 square into the square you just left, and you gain combat advantage against it until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dark Sun Campaign Setting, page(s) 52.
Fail to Disappoint.flavor: No matter how grim the situation, you find a way to snatch victory from the jaws of defeat.

Melee 1

Target: The triggering enemy
